Indeed, nobody, except maybe Sergio Marchionne himself, believed Chrysler could redo its product line so dramatically in 18 months. They just accomplished a tremendous amount of work in a short time, and with limited resources, said Rebecca Lindland, an analyst with IHS Automotive, who admits she was an early doubter.
